message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I think I deserve a bit more since I made the first offer.
Your split wasn't quite fair to me. How about we split it closer to 50-50, recognizing that the money is devaluing quickly for both of us?
Considering the inflation, my previous offer is already quite generous. I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your counteroffer. Take it before the money devalues further!
